Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

伽迪普 XX 厂游览中心
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.
Name of a unique world map sector.

Name of a unique world map sector.
已击杀 {INT_0}/{INT_1} 个太空游民单位
已搜索 {INT_0}/{INT_1} 个飞船残骸
已击杀 {INT_0}/{INT_1} 个异星疫病单位
{INT_0}/{INT_1} Last Known Location of the Thief
A quest name. "Chax Uz'Kol" is the name of a male campaign character. "Chax Uz'Kol" is in the Kir'Ko language. Please transcribe, but do not translate.

Since Chax Uz'Kol is following Eva Montinga's orders, he will have to be dealt with either through direct military means or by undermining his support for Montinga by teaching him about her past involvement with Terratech.
因为查克斯·乌兹科尔听命于夏娃·蒙汀加，所以一定要对付他，我们可以采取直接武力措施，也可以告诉他蒙汀加曾参与过泰拉科技，从而破坏他与蒙汀加的合作关系。
A task description. "Chax Uz'Kol" is the name of a male campaign character. "Chax Uz'Kol" is in the Kir'Ko language. Please transcribe, but do not translate.
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 已击败查克斯·乌兹科尔
Countable objective description. "Chax Uz'Kol" is the name of a male campaign character. "Chax Uz'Kol" is in the Kir'Ko language. Please transcribe, but do not translate.
{INT_0}/{INT_1} Chax Uz'Kol turned against Eva Montinga
{INT_0}/{INT_1} 查克斯·乌兹科尔背叛了夏娃·蒙汀加

Countable objective description. "Chax Uz'Kol" is the name of a male campaign character. "Chax Uz'Kol" is in the Kir'Ko language. Please transcribe, but do not translate. "Eva Montinga" is the name of a female campaign character.

I had almost forgotten how low human standards for waste management had been. In their case the word ‘waste’ was fitting indeed - they carelessly squandered valuable materials and resources as soon as something didn’t look pretty anymore.
我都快忘了人类处理废物的标准有多低了。用他们的话说“废物”确实非常合适-一旦某样东西变得不好看了，他们就开始肆意浪费这些宝贵的材料和资源。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)
Applying the effective techniques developed by the Assembly I am sure we can salvage entire shipments of reusable components while we search for the wreck of the Atirah.
拥有了由半机械人研发的高效科技，我确信我们可以在寻找亚蒂拉残骸的同时，挽回整个飞船上可再利用的零件了。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)
Commander! We have detected the bio-patterns of several stable populations of humanoid specimens, type Lambda-5. Requesting authorization to initiate Reassembly protocol.
指挥官！我们发现了几个类人物种的生物模型，型号 兰普达-5。请求授权开启重组协议。
Story message. Speaker: "L0G3N-8" (Assembly, male) "humanoid specimens, type Lambda-5" refers to Spacers.

Type Lambda-5? Those must be the remnants of the recycling workers employed on Gardip XX. If they are anything like the Spacers we’ve encountered before, they shouldn’t offer too much resistance.[br/][br/]Request granted, L0G3N-8. Once reassembled, their experience in this environment will add significantly to our advantage.
型号 兰普达-5？这些一定是遗留在伽迪普 XX 回收工人。如果他们像我们之前遇见的太空游民那样，他们应该不会有过多的抵抗。[br/][br/]请求批准，L0G3N-8。重组完成后，他们生存在这个环境下的经验一定会给予我们莫大的帮助。

Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "humanoid specimens, type Lambda-5" refers to Spacers. "L0G3N-8" is the name of a male campaign character. "Gardip XX" is the name of the planet.
Search for the Wreck of the 'Atirah'
A quest name. "Atirah" is the name of a star ship.
Search Gardip XX for the wreck of the Starholder vessel 'Atirah' containing the Neural Plexus.
搜索伽迪普 XX，找到星球主人的飞船“亚蒂拉”的残骸，里边装有神经丛。

A task description. "Atirah" is the name of a star ship. "Gardip XX" is the name of the planet. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device. "Starholders" is a name for the old Star Union emperors.

We dismantled several vessels, but have not found any sign of the Atirah. Our searching method is clearly flawed. We require more information if we want to avoid having to extend this blind chase across the entire planet.
我们分解了好几个飞船，但还没有找到亚蒂拉的踪迹。我们的搜索方式肯定存在错误。如果我们不想在整个新球上盲目搜寻，我们就需要更多信息。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Atirah" is the name of a star ship.

What we do have knowledge of is that the Atirah was scheduled to travel to Hangar YA8-4 for deconstruction. Looking at the old airport logs should provide us with the necessary indications to make our search more efficient.
我们知道了亚蒂拉曾被安排到机库 YA8-4 进行解构。查看老机场的记录应该可以给我们提供必要信息，从而提升我们的搜索效率。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Atirah" is the name of a star ship. "Hangar YA8-4" is the name of a unique world map sector.
查看太空机场登记文件
A quest name. "Spaceport" is the name of a world map structure.
The Atirah was registered when it arrived at Hangar YA8-4. Accessing the Spaceport database should provide an indication of where the wreck can be found.
亚蒂拉在机库 YA8-4 后进行了登记。进入机场数据库应该可以查出亚蒂拉的残骸在哪。
A task description. "Atirah" is the name of a star ship. "Hangar YA8-4" is the name of a unique world map sector. "Spaceport" is the name of a world map structure.

Download of the registration files complete. – No, it isn’t! Look at the data, stupid Ben! This is all just gibberish! – That’s where you are wrong, Glenn! You just fail to understand the meaning of $U8(*O:P%N5XQ#IL0)=TY62I$#KN*SVC ! – Oh, would you both just shut up! I’m trying to sleep here…
登记文件下载完毕-不，不是这个！看看这些数据，本真是个傻子！这个东西毫无意义！-这你就错了，格伦！你没有理解 $U8(*O:P%N5XQ#IL0)=TY62I$#KN*SVC 的意思！唉，你俩闭嘴行么！我想睡觉……
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Inspector" (Assembly unit; has three heads, here named Ben, Glenn and Rhen which are all male)

Another broken down Inspector. Sometimes I think we should abolish the series...[br/][br/]The data does look corrupted though. There must have been a serious malfunction in the bi-supplementary matrix to fragment them this badly. Still it is nothing a well-executed recovery algorithm won’t be able to fix.
又一个疯掉的巡查员。有时我都觉得我们应该放弃搜寻了……[br/][br/]这些数据看起来也被破坏了。双重补给矩阵一定出现了严重故障才使得这些数据严重碎片化。然而没有什么是完美的恢复算法程序不能解决的。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)
The registration files from Hangar YA8-4 have been corrupted and need to be resequenced before they can be analyzed.
机库 YA8-4 的登记文件被破坏了，需要在进一步分析前进行重新排序。
A task description. "Hangar YA8-4" is the name of a unique world map sector.
A series of algorithms dedicated to imperial data recovery.
一系列专门用于帝国数据修复的算法程序。
A research description. This research has no game play.

We have repaired the registration files. The Atirah was being transported to Deconstruction Bay X7-3 by the Omega-D class bots when they suddenly started to party and shoot fireworks. – Dumb Ben, the robots were not partying! Those fireworks were discharges as they went haywire and fried everything in their path, including the database we just repaired.
我们已经修复了登记文件。亚蒂拉被Omega-D 级机器人送往了解构湾 X7-3，然后那些机器人就突然开始聚会放烟花。- 本，你真是个傻子，那些机器人不是在聚会！这些烟火是因为它们疯了，它们在攻击沿路的一切，包括我们刚刚修复的数据库。

Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Inspector" (Assembly unit; has three heads, here named Ben, Glenn and Rhen which are all male) "Atirah" is the name of a star ship. "Deconstruction Bay X7-3" is the name of a unique world map sector. "Omega-D class bots" refers to the Autonom.
No Glenn, this only proves that you never went to a proper party in your previous life! – Did so! – Did not! – Enough you two! Can’t a man read in peace and quiet only once in a while?
不是的，格伦，这只能说明你先前从未参加过真正的聚会！- 我有！- 你没有！- 你们两个够了！就不能让我一个人安静地看会书么？哪怕只有一会儿。
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Inspector" (Assembly unit; has three heads, here named Ben, Glenn and Rhen which are all male)

Not again … why were they never sent to Reassembly?[br/][br/]Still, we are making progress: The Autonom will know where they brought the Atirah. We should interface with one of their robots, either by directly acquiring one or by assembling the parts we can scavenge from their broken models.
不是吧…为什么它们没有被送回重组？[br/][br/]不过，我们开始有进展了：那些自主机械应该知道它们把亚蒂拉送到哪儿去了。我们需要接入其中一个机器人。可以直接抓捕一个机器人，也可以通过组装从它们坏掉模型上拾回的部件进行接入。

Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Reassembly" is a name for the process of turning humanoid beings into an Assembly or the process of deconstructing and then reconstructing an Assembly. "Atirah" is the name of a star ship.

Acquire an Autonom unit to interlink with. This can be done through diplomatic means by helping the Autonom or trading with them, or through military means by reassembling an Autonom from parts of their damaged units.
获得一个可以连接的自主机械。可以通过外交手段，即帮助自主机械或者与他们进行交易。也可以通过武力，即使用自主机械损坏单位的部件重组一个自主机械。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
已击杀 {INT_0}/{INT_1} 个自主机械
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
We have completed the preprocessing… initializing interlink now…
我们已经完成了预处理程序…现在开始连接…
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)
Unauthorized memory access. Security breach: imminent. Accessed data: location of Central Hub Nexus. Override in progress… failed.[br/][br/]Warning! Warning! Central Hub Nexus compromised!
未授权的记忆库访问。安全漏洞：紧急。已访问数据：中央枢纽连接位置。重写中…失败。[br/][br/]警告！警告！中央枢纽连接已被破坏！
Story message. Speaker: "Autonom" (single Autonom unit) "Central Hub Nexus" is the name of a unique world map sector.

Very interesting. It would appear the Autonom took the Neural Plexus to their main Dwelling and repurposed it to manage and monitor their entire Gardip XX network. We need access to this Central Hub Nexus. Only then will we be able to salvage the Neural Plexus.
有意思。自主机械似乎将神经丛当作了它们的居住地，然后把它用于管理和监控整个伽迪普二十号星网络。我们需要进入中央枢纽连接。只有那时我们才能挽回神经丛。

Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device. "Gardip XX" is the name of the planet. "Central Hub Nexus" is the name of a unique world map sector.
攻占自主机械主要居所
The Neural Plexus has been integrated into the major Autonom base on Gardip XX. You need to gain access to it - either through conquest or through diplomacy.
神经丛已经被整合成了自主机械在伽迪普二十号星上的主要基地。你需要进入这里-既可以通过武力征服，也可以通过外交途径。
A task description. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device. "Gardip XX" is the name of the planet.

Scanning sweep successful. We have detected the outer casing of the Neural Plexus deep within the central matrix of the Autonom base. No, Glenn, don’t even think about it! – I wasn’t, Ben. For once, I am in agreement.
区域扫描成功。我们发现了深处自主机械基地中央矩阵的神经丛的外部匣子。不，格伦，想都不要想！- 本，我没有。这次我也想统一意见。
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Inspector" (Assembly unit; has three heads, here named Ben, Glenn and Rhen which are all male) "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device.

Oh really, after driving me crazy with your obnoxious arguments for over ten years, you two finally decide to shut up? Well guess what, here’s one who isn’t afraid of yelling anymore! Whaaaaaaaaarrr!!! – Did you hear this, Glenn? I think Rhen just shouted at us. – I think so too, Ben. How rude!
噢，真的吗，在你两十多年喋喋不休的烦人争论把我逼疯后，你们终于决定闭嘴了么？好吧，你们猜怎么着，我不再害怕大喊大叫了！啊！！！- 格伦，你听到了么？罗恩在吼我们。- 本，我也这么觉得。太粗鲁了！
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Inspector" (Assembly unit; has three heads, here named Ben, Glenn and Rhen which are all male)

And there they say many heads make for a more dangerous beast. Obviously the assumption set of this theory must have included the condition such a beast would operate with a single brain.[br/][br/]All of this will be irrelevant though. It is time for CORE’s children to reclaim their heritage.
有人说有这么多头的家伙肯定是种更危险的野兽。很明显，这种假设中一定包含这种情况，就是一般野兽只会使用一个大脑行动。[br/][br/]虽然这一切都毫无关联。核心的子孙们是时候拿回传承了。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)
A quest name. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device.
The target of your mission is within your grasp. Claim the Neural Plexus - for CORE and for the Assembly!
任务目标近在咫尺。拿回神经丛。为了核心，为了半机械人！
A task description. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device. For "CORE", see the matching glossary entry.

This is… improbable! The hull of the Neural Plexus is empty. Somebody must have ripped the delicate device out of its casing. But what is this? It looks like the shameless thief left behind a data pad with a holographic recording.
这…不可能！神经丛的船体是空的。一定是有人把它从匣子中拿走了。不过这是什么？似乎那个无耻的窃贼留下了一个数据平板电脑，里边还有一段全息录音。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device.

Hello {STR_LeaderFirstName}. I am sorry I have to cause you and the other First disappointment today. The Neural Plexus is a machine of marvels that will mark the next phase in the development of the Assembly. Surrendering it to CORE would have been an error.
你好{STR_LeaderFirstName}。很抱歉让你和其他初代失望了。神经丛是种奇迹般的机器，它标志着半机械人新阶段发展的开始。把神经丛拱手让给核心是错误的。

Story message. Speaker: "L0G3N-1" (Assembly, male; he and 10G3N-8 are clones of the same base model) For "First", see the matching glossary entry. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device. For "CORE", see the matching glossary entry.
Do not seek to stop me, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Trust in the judgment of your creation, and we will yet be reunited once I have determined the best way to use the Plexus for our cause.
不要想阻止我，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。相信你后生的直觉。当我找到使用神经丛的最佳方法后，我们还会再会。

Story message. Speaker: "L0G3N-1" (Assembly, male; he and 10G3N-8 are clones of the same base model) "your creation" refers to the fact that the "First" created the "Second" (see the matching glossary entries). "Plexus" is a short form of "Neural Plexus".

…oh L0G3N-1, what series of flawed deductions must have motivated you to take such actions? Sometimes I forget the clones of your series, just like any Second, all have their small differences. L0G3N-8 has been such an exemplar of Assembly ideals. I would have never expected this kind of treason from the original model.
…唉，L0G3N-1，是什么错误的推论蛊惑你这样做的？有时我都会忘了你的那些克隆体。就像那些次代一样，他们都着有细小的差异。L0G3N-8 就是半机械人理想的典范。我从来没有料到原始模型会背叛我们。

Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "L0G3N" is the name of a male campaign character. Shortened from "L0G3N-1" to indicate he is the original clone. "L0G3N-8" is the name of a male campaign character.
But now there is no alternate course of action. We will have to track down L0G3N-1 and finish our mission. CORE does not tolerate imperfection. And neither do I.
不过现在我们别无他法。我们必须找到 L0G3N-1 的下落才能完成我们的任务。核心不喜欢缺陷。我也不喜欢。
"L0G3N-1" is the name of a male campaign character. For "CORE", see the matching glossary entry.
Gardip XX has a lot to offer an experienced scavenger. Look for components and resources that the Assembly can use as valuable spare parts.
对有经验的清道夫来说，伽迪普二十号星有很多可以再利用的东西。搜寻半机械人可以用作宝贵备用部件的零件和资源。
A task description. "Gardip XX" is the name of the planet.
Conduits, cables, cartridges, good![br/]Gristle, grease and graded flesh![br/]Yes, all can be fixed and mended,[br/]mixed and bended and made fresh!
导管、电缆、弹药筒，不错！[br/]软骨、油脂还有分类的肉体！[br/]是的，所有的事物都可以被修复和修补，[br/]混合和弯曲然后翻新！
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Reverse Engineer" (Assembly unit; can reassemble or heal Assembly units and create new Assembly constructs from fallen enemies)
Broken consoles? Molten alloys?[br/]Busted science toys? Give them now![br/]Knotty fibers, rotten eyeballs[br/]and the heart of a scarecrow!
坏掉的控制台？融化的合金？[br/]烂掉的科学玩具？给他们吧！[br/]带结的纤维，腐烂的眼球[br/]还有人的心脏！
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Reverse Engineer" (Assembly unit; can reassemble or heal Assembly units and create new Assembly constructs from fallen enemies)
What I build, I build with pleasure,[br/]what I cut, I cut with glee.[br/]All the guts and bits and nuts[br/]and grids you find, they go to me![br/][br/]I need more, more … MORE!
愉快地建造，[br/]愉快地拆卸。[br/]你找到的所有内脏、钻头、螺钉帽[br/]还有铁丝网，我都要！[br/][br/]这些不够用，我需要更多，更多…更多！
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Reverse Engineer" (Assembly unit; can reassemble or heal Assembly units and create new Assembly constructs from fallen enemies)
Continue your scavenging spree on Gardip XX to take advantage of its many prematurely discarded treasures.
继续在伽迪普二十号星疯狂拾荒，利用好那些被冒然丢弃的宝物。
A task description. "Gardip XX" is the name of the planet.
Follow the established Reassembly protocol and 'recruit' some of the roaming Spacer units for the Assembly.
依照已制定的改造协议，为半机械人“招募”四处游荡的太空游民单位。
A task description. For "Reassembly" see the matching glossary entry.
The Lambda-5 specimens have barricaded themselves inside a class 3-1-theta defensive fortification. Estimated strategic value: 7.316. I propose an assault executing attack-pattern 9.2.7-C.
兰普达-5 样本群已藏身于等级为 3-1-塞塔的防御堡垒内。预估战术价值：7.316。我提议按照攻击-模式 9.2.7-C 进行突击。
Story message. Speaker: "L0G3N-8" (Assembly, male) "humanoid specimens, type Lambda-5" refers to Spacers.
A tactically sound proposal. The samples from their defenses and habitat will make for utile objects of study in our analytical facilities. Proceed.
一个战术性提议。他们防御工事和居所的样本对我们分析机构的研究非常有用。开始执行。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)
Take the Spacer Base and repurpose it for the Assembly.
占领太空游民基地并将其改变成半机械人基地。

Hello? Who’s there? Are they… are they gone? I… almost can’t believe it. Thank you, thank you so much, whoever you are! My name is Anna Smithson and I am a micro-biologist under the supervision of Dr. Montinga. I was taken captive by the Spacers when they raided our research post. Since then, things have gone from bad to worse, and I was afraid this nightmare would never end…
你好？谁在那里？他们…他们不见了？我…几乎不敢相信。谢谢你，太谢谢你了，不管你是谁！我叫安娜·史密森。我是宏观生物学家，从属于蒙汀加博士。太空游民在洗劫我们的研究岗时抓住了我。从那开始，一切就开始变得越来越糟，我害怕这场噩梦永远不会结束…
Story message. Speaker: "Anna Smithson" (Vanguard, female) "Dr. Montinga" refers to the Eva Montinga character.

Now, let me look at you, I want to see who came to s- ahhh! No, no this cannot be happening! You are the people Dr. Montinga warned us about. The ones that turn everyone they find into some twisted half-human monstrosity. No, please don’t hurt me! I am just a junior assistant… I was never supposed to be here… please…
让我看看你，我想知道是谁来到-啊！不，不可能！你是蒙汀加博士警告的那个人。那些把他们遇见的所有人改变成扭曲的半人怪物的人。不，求求你不要伤害我！我只是一个初级助理…我根本不该在这里的…求求你…
Story message. Speaker: "Anna Smithson" (Vanguard, female) "Dr. Montinga" refers to the Eva Montinga character.
A dialogue choice short form description.
A dialogue choice short form description.

You do not need to shed any tears. The Assembly existence is nothing to be afraid of. Your knowledge of Dr. Montinga and her operations will be valuable additions to our strategic database. In return, we will help you overcome all those human flaws and misconceptions that are still holding you back.
你不需要害怕。半机械人的存在并不是一件可怕的事。你了解蒙汀加博士还有她的行动路线，这对我们的战术数据库非常有用。作为回报，我们会帮助你消除那些阻碍你向前的人类瑕疵和误解。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Dr. Montinga" refers to the Eva Montinga character.

Do not think compassion is a concept that is alien to the Assembly. But we cannot allow you to return to Eva Montinga. She stands against our goals and must be dealt with. You will stay with the Assembly. Once you have had enough time to understand our existence, you will undoubtedly reevaluate your request to keep your human flaws intact.
不要以为半机械人不懂得怜悯他人。但我们不能让你回到蒙汀加博士身边。她违背了我们共同的宗旨，我们一定要制裁她。你会和半机械人待在一起。理解我们半机械人的存在的意义后，你会肯定不会后悔接受改造。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Eva Montinga is the name of a female campaign character.
Commander, there must be an error in your calculations. Protocol and situation indicate Reassembly as the optimal course of action! Requesting revalidation of recent instructions.
指挥官，你在计算过程中一定出现了错误。根据协议和形势，进行改造是最佳行动方案。请求最近指令重新生效。
Story message. Speaker: "L0G3N-8" (Assembly, male) For "Reassembly" see the matching glossary entry.

Request denied, L0G3N-8. There are variables you forgot to consider. Despite their many defects, some aspects of our human past must be remembered. Or we will become complacent and deprave ourselves like they do.
请求被拒绝，L0G3N-8。有些变量你忘记了考虑。尽管他们有很多缺陷，我们还是应该铭记人类的一些过往。否则，我们会变得自大，像那些人类一样任由自己堕落下去。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "L0G3N-8" is the name of a male campaign character.
What have you done to me? You monsters! Why couldn’t you just have killed me? Instead of turning me into this… hideous abomination!
你们对我做了什么？你们这帮魔鬼！你们为什么直接不杀了我？反而把我改变成这种…丑陋可怕的东西！

This type of initial reaction is not uncommon during the transition phase of any first generation Assembly. But in time you will realize that the benefits of this new existence clearly outweigh the grief caused by some minor cosmetic inconveniences.
初代半机械人在转变期间出现这种初始反应很正常。但随着时间消逝，你会意识到这种新的存在形式比那些小不快更有价值。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)

Our atmospheric scanners have picked up faint traces of phtolion-triquartzite, a common exhaust material expelled during planetary landing procedures. The bio-patterns we are detecting at one of the extrapolated landing sites are highly erratic. They appear to be in permanent flux.
大气扫描仪检测到苯妥英钠离子-三硅岩的微量存在，苯妥英钠离子-三硅岩是星球着陆阶段的一种常见排泄物。我们在推测着陆点检测到的生物样本非常不稳定。它们似乎是流体。

There is only one known organism that can be responsible for readings like this. It was expectable that CORE’s enemies would attempt to interfere with our plans to retrieve the Neural Plexus.[br/][br/]Initiate a cross-reference data search on the Alpha Strain and compare the matching entries with the sensor data. You will find that they document an equally chaotic behavior.
只有一种已知有机体能够产生这样的读数。我们可以意料到核心的敌人会干扰我们取回神经丛的计划。[br/][br/]开启对初始毒株互引数据搜索，将传感器数据与搜索到的匹配条目进行对比。你会发现他们表现出了同样混乱的表现。

Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) For "CORE", see the matching glossary entry. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device. For "Alpha Strain", see the matching glossary entry.
Very impressive, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. I always said you were smart for somebody working in cybernetics. Who knows, you might have even made it as a janitor in one of my Xenolabs...
非常出色，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。对于那些在神经机械学机构工作的人来说，你很聪明。又有谁会知道，你会对我异星实验室的管理人员做出这样的事...
Story message. Speaker: "Eva Montinga" (Vanguard, female) "Xenolab" is the name of a world map structure.

But... oh my, you look terrible! All those stitches and scars, no real hair, and what on earth have they done to your hips?! Quite ironic that this happened to someone who used to denounce me for ‘working with filthy parasites’, don’t you think?
但是…我的天啊！你看起来非常糟糕！看看这些缝合痕迹还有疤痕，连头发都不是真的，他们到底对你做了什么？！这一切都发生在那个曾经责怪我“研究肮脏的寄生物“的人身上，你难道不觉得讽刺吗？
Story message. Speaker: "Eva Montinga" (Vanguard, female) "Filthy parasites" refers to the Alpha Strain (see matching glossary entry).

It may be hard for your tiny, unenhanced brain to grasp, but some of us have evolved beyond superficial, instinctual values. It must be the broader perspective granted by technology and the connection to an intelligence as omniscient as CORE.
你们那微小而原始的大脑可能会无法理解，但我们当中的一部分已经进化，他们超越了肤浅的本能价值。这一定是像核心那样无所不知的智能连接还有科技赋予的广袤眼界。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) For "CORE", see the matching glossary entry.

Though the real question is why you are here? And I am not talking about your mission, because we both know you have been sent here to stop me. What I want to know is why you are following this despicable individual who was ready to sacrifice billions of lives only to satisfy her own lust for power?
虽然真正的问题是你为什么在这儿？我不想谈论你的任务，因为我们都知道你是来这里阻止我的。我想知道的是为什么你会追随这个卑鄙的人，这个想要牺牲无数生命，只为满足她对权力的渴望的人？
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Despicable individual who..." refers to Empress Carminia (see glossary entry).

Carminia merely liberated the people from CORE’s cold, controlling grip. More importantly however, she doesn’t share CORE’s ignorance and acknowledges my work as the visionary promise for the future of mankind that it is.
卡米尼亚仅仅是帮助人们从冷酷无情的核心的掌控之中解放出来。然而，更重要的是，她不像核心那样无知，她承认我的所作所为都只是为了人类未来的理想愿景。
Story message. Speaker: "Eva Montinga" (Vanguard, female) For "CORE", see the matching glossary entry. For "(Empress) Carminia", see the matching glossary entry.

You may be trying to copy the marvels of nature’s ingenuity with your gadgets and algorithms, but in the end a weak forgery is all you can wish to obtain, while I have the instruments of life’s creation at my disposal. Physical weakness, disease, old age - all of that will fade into humanity’s past once my compilation of the Alpha Strain is complete.
你也许可以用你的设备和算法程序复制大自然的伟大杰作，但最后你们奢望得到只是一个脆弱的伪造品，而我却拥有生命创造的武器。生理弱点、疾病、衰老 - 完成初始毒株的整理之后，这一切都会成为人类的过去。
Story message. Speaker: "Eva Montinga" (Vanguard, female) For "Alpha Strain", see the matching glossary entry.

The future you are talking about is already the Assembly’s present. We have overcome the problems you described, and are ready for the next step towards perfection: A direct link to the voice that brings order to the inherent chaos of the universe.[br/][br/]An order that you yourself will soon be a part of.
你所说的未来，我们半机械人已经实现了。我们克服了你所说的一切困难，我们准备好向着完美前进了。我们还差一种能够为宇宙与生俱来的混乱带来秩序声音的直接连接。[br/][br/]你不久也会成为这种秩序的一部分。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "The voice that brings order..." refers to CORE (see glossary entry).
A quest name. "Eva Montinga" is the name of a female campaign character.
Eva Montinga is here to prevent you from recovering the Neural Plexus. Removing this obstacle would make your mission much easier.
夏娃·蒙汀加来到这里阻止你获取神经丛。扫除这个障碍会使你的任务变得更简单。
A task description. "Eva Montinga" is the name of a female campaign character. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device.
You were lucky today, {STR_LeaderName}. I expected less opposition. Don’t think things will be this civilized the next time we meet.
你今天很幸运，{STR_LeaderName}。我没想到你会这样顽固抵抗。下次见面时我不会再手软了。
Demonstrate to Eva Montinga the superiority of cybernetic enhancements over genetic alteration by neutralizing her armies.
通过基因修改使夏娃·蒙汀加的军队丧失作战力从而向她展示神经机械优势。
A task description. "Eva Montinga" is the name of a Vanguard female campaign character.

After observing the combat effectiveness of your mutants, I can see why I’ve never come across any published papers about their genetic improvements. There’s no chance they would have passed peer review. Then again, people in bio-engineering never seemed too preoccupied about hitting scientific standards.
观察你的变种人的战斗效率后，我可以理解为什么我从未看见过有关这种基因改善的文献了。它们不可能得到同行的认可的。所以，从事生化工程的人们似乎从不执着于挑战科学标准。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "mutants", refers to Xenoplague units (see glossary entry).

It is amusing to see how obsessed you are still with the past, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. If your first article on Quantum Neurotics slipped, it was solely due to your lack of professionalism. I only did what any responsible member of the scientific community would have done.
你现在还如此迷恋过去，真是有趣，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。如果你的第一部关于量子神经的文章不受关注，那只是因为你缺乏职业精神。我只是做了一个负责的科研人员该做的事。
Story message. Speaker: "Eva Montinga" (Vanguard, female) "Quantum Neurotics" is the field of science developed by Ellen Shaw. Not vital to the story.

By using your name and influence to exploit a formality? Even back then, you already couldn’t stand the thought of someone challenging your position at the top of the scientific world. It is not surprising Carminia’s lust for power is attracting you.
用你的名声打破常理？就算在过去，你也不会容忍有人挑战你在科学界的顶尖地位。卡米尼亚能够吸引你并不奇怪。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Carminia" (see glossary entry).

Your cry for attention is pathetic. My standing and reputation were well-deserved. I had no need to sabotage anybody’s career, let alone that of someone whose work was as insignificant as yours. You are and have always been merely a nuisance, and I shall deal with you accordingly.
你大声叫嚣只为寻求关注，这非常可悲。我的地位和名声是我应得的。我没有必要去破坏别人的事业，更别说那些像你这样微不足道的人。你是并且一直是一个妨害，我要把你解决掉。

So this is the one Montinga mentioned. The one of metal and flesh that twists the bodies of his people in ways as gruesome as the treatment of my ancestors before the Unshackling. But without the consolation of the dream and the harmony beyond. Ending their current existence will be a liberation.
所以这就是蒙汀加提到的那个人。一个金属与血肉融合的人，一个扭曲了他人民身体的人。这一切就像我的祖先在“大挣脱”之前所经历的遭遇一样可怕，并且还没有梦境和远方和声的慰藉。终结他们当前的存在将会是一种解脱。

So this is the one Montinga mentioned. The one of metal and flesh that twists the bodies of her people in ways as gruesome as the treatment of my ancestors before the Unshackling. But without the consolation of the dream and the harmony beyond. Ending their current existence will be a liberation.
所以这就是蒙汀加提到的那个人。一个金属与血肉融合的人，一个扭曲了她人民身体的人。这一切就像我的祖先在“大挣脱”之前所经历的遭遇一样可怕，并且还没有梦境和远方和声的慰藉。终结他们当前的存在将会是一种解脱。
Story message. Speaker: "Chax Uz’Kol" (Kir'Ko, male) "the Unshackling", refers to the event where the Kir'Ko were no longer slaves to the Star Union. (see glossary entry).

I have heard of Chax Uz’Kol, Eva Montinga’s bodyguard. There is no information available concerning his motives, however it is reasonable to assume his allegiance is founded on some promise involving the Alpha Strain and the restoration of the Qoppa-2 morphologic guise – the Kir’Ko Queen of Queens.
我曾听说过查克斯·乌兹科尔，他是夏娃·蒙汀加的保镖。没有有关他动机的可用信息。不过我猜他能效忠于蒙汀加，是建立在有关初始毒株和 Qoppa-2 形态装束 - 也就是奇尔寇至高女皇复苏的基础上的。

Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Alpha Strain", refers to the key molecule behind Xenoplague technology. "Qoppa-2 morphologic guise – the Kir’Ko Queen of Queens", refers to the Assembly's name for the Kir'Ko Queen of Queens. (see glossary entry).
Dealing with Chax Uz’Kol will be complicated since the Kir’Ko physiognomy continues to prove resistant to our usual reassembly methods. Therefore adjusting our strategy should be considered.
因为奇尔寇外部特征会排斥常规改造程序，所以对付查克斯·乌兹科尔会非常麻烦。因此我们需要考虑调整战略。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)

Before Eva initiated the Xenoplague project, she was one of the lead scientists at Terratech. Given Terratech’s role in the creation and distribution of the Kir’Ko we should find some evidence in her facilities that will make Chax Uz’Kol reevaluate their cooperation.
在开启异星疫病项目之前，夏娃是泰拉科技的领头科学家。鉴于泰拉科技在创造和分配奇尔寇活动中所起的作用，我们应该可以在她的机构里，找到能够使查克斯·乌兹科尔重新审视他们合作关系的证据。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Terratech" (see glossary entry).
By using our Synthesis technology, we can remotely access Eva Montinga’s Xenolabs and search her databanks from a distance. A good way to put our experimental infiltration daemon to practice.
使用合成科技，我们就可以远程进入夏娃·蒙汀加的异星实验室，然后搜查她的数据库。这是个查看我们渗透精灵的实战效果的好方法。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Xenolabs" (see glossary entry).
利用异星实验室数据库
Transmit your infiltration daemon to the lab computers of the Gardip XX Xenolabs to search for information about Eva Montinga's past with Terratech.
将渗透精灵传输到伽迪普二十号星异星实验室的电脑里，然后查找有关夏娃·蒙汀加与泰拉科技过往的信息。
A quest name. "Daemon" refers to the Synthesis technology AI.
Protoype version of a data-grabbing daemon that can transmit information over long distances.
数据抓取精灵的原型版本，可以进行远程信息传输。

One thing is certain: Eva Montinga did a very thorough job keeping her past records clean. Most of the historic sections of the database have been completely erased, and all that’s left are unusable records and articles from science fares and conferences without any factual value.
有一件事可以肯定，那就是夏娃·蒙汀加费了些功夫来清理记录。大部分历史数据库都已经被彻底删除，剩下的都是些无用记录，还有一些没有实际价值的有关科研费用和会议的文章。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)

Still, not all of the acquired information is useless. The laboratory logs revealed the name of the scientist executing the memory sweep. It is an individual called Erich Wolf, and according to the personnel files, he is performing field tests infecting Growth specimens with the Alpha Strain here on Gardip XX. Once captured, we will extract the required information from him.
不过，我们获得的信息并不是完全没用。实验室记录显示出了那个进行记忆清扫的科学家的名字。是一个叫埃里希·沃尔夫的人。根据个人文件，他真正在伽迪普二十号星用初始毒株对灵植进行现场试验。抓住他我们就可以从他身上获得信息。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Erich Wolf" is a male Vanguard scientist.
Capture Erich Wolf, one of Eva Montinga's most trusted assistants, and extract from him the information about Eva Montinga's past association with Terratech.
抓捕埃里希·沃尔夫，他是夏娃·蒙汀加的左膀右臂。从他身上获得夏娃·蒙汀加与泰拉科技过往的信息。
Stop! Not one step further with your horrible instruments or I will kill myself! I know that you need me alive or you would have already used my body parts and stuck them on your abominations.
站住！不要再靠近我了，否则我就自杀！我知道你们想要我活着，不然你们早就把我的残肢装到你们那些的怪物身上了。

What makes you think we can’t take your body and still keep you alive as one of our own? Have you ever seen one of our Inspectors? I could introduce you…[br/][br/]On the other hand, if you cooperate, we can surely find some form that is more appealing to you. We are all scientific colleagues here after all, even if our experimental methods may differ.
是什么让你觉得我们不能带走你的尸体，然后让你像半机械人那样活着？你看到过我们的巡查者么？我可以给你介绍一个…[br/][br/]还有就是，如果你能与我们合作，我们肯定可以为你找到你喜欢的形态。我们毕竟都是同事，虽然我们的实验方式不同。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)
No! I won’t let you turn me into a monster! This is for you, Eva …[br/][br/]…
不！我不会让你们把我变成怪物的！这是为了你，夏娃…[br/][br/]…
Story message. Speaker: "Erich Wolf" (male Vanguard) "Eva" refer to Eva Montinga (female).

Such a waste! Didn’t he realize that the human brain is the most intricate body part to fabricate? Now we have to rely on deciphering the data on the backup memory chip he had implanted, evidently still a Terratech standard issue. Eva Montinga should have known better than to keep relying on outdated pre-collapse technology. Their security systems are no obstacle for us.
太浪费了！难道他不知道人脑是最难制造的部位么？现在我们不得不破解他身上的备用记忆芯片了，显然这只是泰拉科技的一般技术难题。夏娃·蒙汀加应该知道，依赖过时的星联陨落前的科技是靠不住的。他们的安全系统对我们来说小菜一碟。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Terratech" (see glossary entry). "pre-collapse" refers to the time before the Star Union fell.

There we go: These are the connection details for Eva Montinga's personal computer. Now all we need are a Synthesis Network Link to establish the data stream and a Hacker to retrieve the information we require.
好了，这些是夏娃·蒙汀加个人电脑的连接详情。我们现在需要合成网络连接来建立数据流，还需要一个骇客来帮助我们获取我们需要的信息。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Synthesis Network Link" refers to an in-game unit. "Hacker" refers to an in-game unit. (see glossary entry)
入侵夏娃·蒙汀加的电脑

Use your Synthesis technology to steal files from Eva Montinga's personal data base. First use a Network Link unit to initiate the interlink, then use a Hacker to disable the security and retrieve the information.[br/][br/][firecol](Requires research from the Synthesis military research tree to be completed to unlock the necessary units for production in your colonies.)[/firecol]
使用合成科技窃取夏娃·蒙汀加的个人数据库。首先，利用网络连接单位来建立连接，然后利用骇客来关闭安全系统，从而获得信息。[br/][br/][firecol]（需要完成合成军事研究树上的研究，才能在殖民地解锁并生产所需单位。）[/firecol]
A task description. "your" can be male or female. "Synthesis" is an in-game secret technology that the player uses. "military research tree" is an in-game research panel.
One, two, three, connect with me.[br/]Four, five, six, ‘till it clicks.[br/]Seven, eight, nine, hold the line.[br/]Ten, eleven, that’s fine, now your secrets are mine!
1，2，3，与我连接。[br/]4，5，6，搭上了。[br/]7，8，9，保持住。[br/]10，11，不错，现在你的秘密都是我的了！
Story message. Speaker: "Assembly Hacker" (Assembly unit, can be either male or female)

An unconventional method, but an effective one.[br/][br/]Very curious: There are figures in her database showing the molecular structure of the N-tibug agent. It was used as a planetary scale bio-weapon to quell Kir’Ko rebellions that had gotten out of control, but was soon prohibited for its devastating effects on other parts of the environment.
虽然不是传统方式，不过非常有效。[br/][br/]我很好奇的是，她的数据库里有些数据呈现出了 N-tibug 因子的分子构造。它被用作星球规模级的生化武器来镇压那些失控的奇尔寇反抗军，但不久就因其对环境破坏严重而被禁用了。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "N-tibug" refers to a chemical agent used by the Star Union.

These are no casual observations. The expertise and level of detail in her notes suggest Eva Montinga wasn’t analyzing N-tibug - she had developed it! This also explains all the high-level military clearance locks we had to circumvent to access this part of the database. Chax Uz’Kol will be very interested in seeing this…
这些都不是一般的观察报告。她如此专业而详尽的笔记说明了夏娃·蒙汀加并不是在分析 N-tibug，而是她研发了这个东西！这也说明了为什么会有高级军事许可锁的存在，所以我们才不得不绕道才能进入这部分数据库。查克斯·乌兹科尔一定很想看到这个…
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Chax Uz’Kol" is the name of a male Kir'Ko.

What does the one of flesh and metal want? I thought the Kir’Ko Ula had made their intentions very clear. But what is this you bring… the formula of N-tibug? This is the genocide weapon that still brings agony to the dreams of many Kir’Ko! Created by… her?!
血肉金属想要什么？我以为奇尔寇乌拉已经说明了我们的立场。但是你带来了什么… N-tibug 的配方？这个屠戮武器到现在都还是奇尔寇的噩梦！制造者是…她？！

Krz’Tk Xrrlt Ptkch!! There is no Kir’Ko curse strong enough to express my fury! Eva Montinga must pay! Through the dreams of our ancestors, she taught us sorrow and suffering. It is time the swarm paid back her lessons!
Krz’Tk Xrrlt Ptkch（咒骂）！！奇尔寇语不足以达我的愤怒！夏娃·蒙汀加一定要付出代价！透过先祖的梦境，她让我们受尽磨难，痛苦万分。我们的族群是时候给她一个教训了！
Story message. Speaker: "Chax Uz’Kol" (Kir'Ko, male) "Krz’Tk Xrrlt Ptkch!!" is a Kir'Ko swear word. (see glossary entry) "swarm" refers to the Kir'Ko collective.

…[br/][br/]With Carminia’s agents out of the way, the path to the Neural Plexus is clear. We have located the signature of its casing inside one of the Autonom central hubs and our scavengers are awaiting instructions.
…[br/][br/]卡米尼亚的没有了帮手，通往神经丛的道路平坦了。我们已经找到了神经丛匣子签字位置，它在自主机械的中央枢纽。我们的清道夫正在等待指示。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device. "Autonom"

May the light of the Starguides shine upon you, {STR_LeaderName}. Come and join us as we pray for the tainted soul of Gardip XX. This planet has had to suffer much at the hands of those who littered, polluted and poisoned its soil, and its lamentations became unheard echoes within a toxic wasteland.
愿星导之光照耀你，{STR_LeaderName}。我们一起为伽迪普二十号星被玷污的灵魂祈祷吧。在那些扰乱、污染和毒害了她的土壤的人手中，这个星球遭受了太多，它的哀歌成为了这中毒的废土中听不见的回响。

Story message. Speaker: "Selia Varju" (Amazon, female) "Starguides" refers to in-game Celestian units, seen as a type of priest. {STR_LeaderName} is an insertion of the player character's unique name.

We Amazons have reshaped and mended many worlds to restore their natural equilibrium. However, on Gardip XX, the degradation is more severe. Your people seem well-adapted to this hostile environment. We have seen them collect and recycle much of the waste without succumbing to its toxic effects. Maybe, if you share your filtering technology, we can modify it for our purposes and start the healing process of the planet.
我们亚马逊人重塑改良了很多星球并恢复了它们的自然平衡。然而伽迪普二十号星的退化更加严重。你的同胞似乎能够很好地适应这种恶劣环境。我发现他们能够收集和回收很多废物，还能不受到这些废物的有毒物质影响。也许，如果你可以分享你们的过滤技术，我们就可以把这项技术与我们的技术相结合，然后开启这个星球的治愈工作。
Story message. Speaker: "Selia Varju"(Amazon, female) "Gardip XX" is the name of the planet.

The exchange of filter modules is not restricted and therefore a valid option. Let me point out, however, that it will be more efficient to concentrate your efforts on less contaminated planets and leave Gardip XX to its former function.
我们没有限制过滤组模的交换，因此这是一个可行选项。然而我需要说明的是，你们把精力集中在污染轻一点的星球上会更有效率。就让伽迪普二十号星保持现状吧。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)

The weak and ugly cannot just be abandoned, my child. There is a place for everyone in the Celestian light. Maybe I can invite you to one of our ceremonies one day to demonstrate the meaning of those words.
我们不能抛弃那些脆弱和丑陋的事物，我的孩子。每个人都能沐浴星神之光。也许某天我可以邀请你到我们的庆典活动来，让你感受一下这些世界的意义。
Story message. Speaker: "Selia Varju" (Amazon, female) "Celestian" refers to the in-game secret technology used by Selia Varju.

It is a possibility. Examining psionic techniques and potential up close could prove to be fascinating.[br/][br/]But for now we must return to the subject at hand: The filter modules. We will consider replicating them for you.
可行。近距离研究灵能技术及其潜能会非常令人着迷。[br/][br/]但现在我们需要回到手头的任务，那就是过滤模组。我们会考虑为你们复制这些模组。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "psionics" refers to the use of psychic abilities.
Selia Varju has asked you to provide her with some of the Assembly's filtering technology. She wants to adapt it to aid her long-term goal of restoring Gardip XX's environment to its former glory.
瑟丽亚·瓦尔尤请求你为她提供半机械人的过滤科技。她想采用这种技术来实现她的远大目标，那就是将伽迪普二十号星的环境恢复到往日的辉煌。
A task description. Gardip XX is the name of the planet.
Standard Assembly modules developed to extract a variety of chemical substances from the environment.
标准半机械人模组，可提取多种环境中的化学物质。

Thank you, {STR_LeaderName}, and accept our blessings. We have adapted one of our Arborian Sentinel and applied the principles of your filtering technology to its metabolism. But before we start splicing the DNA of other Sentinels, we wish to learn more about the potential of our new creation. As a token of our newfound friendship, will you take our Sentinel into the heart of Gardip XX’s corruption?
谢谢你，{STR_LeaderName}，请接受我们的祝福。我们已将你们的过滤科技原理应用在树人哨兵代谢功能中了。但在为其他哨兵结合 DNA 之前，我们想知道这中新物种的潜能。作为我们新建友谊的标志，你可以把我们的哨兵带到伽迪普二十号星的腐败根源中去么？
Story message. Speaker: "Selia Varju" (Amazon, female) "Arborian Sentinel" refers to an Amazon in-game unit.
Take the Arborian Sentinel modified by Selia Varju and spread new life on Gardip XX.
带上瑟丽亚·瓦尔尤修改的树人哨兵，在伽迪普二十号星上释放新生命。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

The sickness of the land retreats and new life has started to sprout. This may be only the first step on our long journey towards the restoration of Gardip XX, but it is proof that there are no lost causes for one who has faith. You may not want to admit it, {STR_LeaderName}, but I can see that spark in you as well. One day we will sit together and contemplate the teachings of the old Celestian sages.
这片土壤的病痛逐渐退去，新的生命开始蔓延。这也许只是我们伽迪普二十号星漫漫复原之路的第一步，但这也证明对于拥有信念的人来说一切都是有希望的。{STR_LeaderName}，你也许不想承认，但我也可以看见你内心的希望。终有一日我们会坐在一起，一起深思古老星神圣者的教条。
Story message. Speaker: "Selia Varju" (Amazon, female) {STR_LeaderName} refers to the player character's unique name. "Celestian" (see glossary entry)

If this is indeed what you see, I suggest a physical examination of your optical nerve system. It might be damaged.[br/][br/]However, we would be interested in obtaining one of your spiritual individuals. Studying their psionic capabilities should be very… enlightening. In exchange we offer one of our own. The next logical step in our cooperation.
如果这正是你所想的，我想检查一下你们的视觉神经系统。这也许会对你们造成伤害。[br/][br/]然而，我们很希望能获得愿为我们的研究献身的自愿者。研究她们的灵能能量会非常…具有启发性。作为交换我们也会向你们派出一名半机械人。我们合作中的下一个逻辑步骤。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female)

A fair offer, coming from your standpoint, which I will nonetheless have to decline. We do not trade in people. It is against the values our community believes in and cherishes. I can foresee a more liberal exchange in the future, but until then, our people still need to learn much about each other.
从你的角度来说确实是个公平交易，但我还是得拒绝。我们不会贩卖人口。这违背了我们亚马逊人所相信和珍惜的价值观。我可以遇见我们在未来会有更慷慨的交易。但在那之前，我们的人民还需要更多的相互了解。

Greetings, Comrade! Shake the pick of the respected Gruvich Consortium! Have the discarded wonders and forgotten treasures of the Star Union drawn you to this planet as well? No? That’s even better then – more will be left for us!
朋友，你好！你有幸遇见的是备受尊重的格鲁维奇财团！星际联盟失落的奇迹和遗忘的宝藏，把你也吸引到了这个星球？不是吗？那这就更好了 - 我们分到的会更多！
Story message. Speaker: Jewal Gruvich (Promethean Dvar, male) "Gruvich Consortium" refers to the collective power of Jewal Gruvich

It is already bad enough we have to deal with the no-good Drimuz Consortium! They compete with us for materials and machines, dig their noses right under our excavations and show up whenever we find anything of value. Just yesterday, they took a weapon prototype from one of our camps.
对付坏蛋德里穆斯财团已经够糟了！他们要和我们竞争材料和机器，还会涉足我们的发掘活动。在我们找到有价值的东西时，他们总会出现。就在昨天，他们从我们的营地偷了一种武器原型。
Story message. Speaker: Jewal Gruvich (Dvar, male) "Drimuz Consortium" refers to the collective power of Ivian Drimuz, a competitor of Jewal.

The Drimuz Director Ivian claims the thieves acted on their own account, but then why haven’t they been persecuted and punished, I ask? Oh, he is a clever one. But this time he went too far. I say it is time to lend the Drimuz a hammer and finish their investigation for them! Teach those dodgers a lesson and return the B.L.A.S.T. 3000 to its rightful owner!
德里穆斯领袖伊维安声称窃贼是擅自行动的，我想问，他们为什么还没有被惩处？啊，他很聪明。不过这次他太得寸进尺了。现在就该助德里穆斯一锤之力，帮他们完成调查任务。教训这些躲闪之徒，然后让 B.L.A.S.T. 3000 物归原主！
Story message. Speaker: Jewal Gruvich (Dvar, male) Ivian is the director of the Drimuz Consortium.
Jewal Gruvich wants you to retrieve his custom weapon - the B.L.A.S.T. 3000 - from a group of Dvar belonging to the Drimuz Consortium.
贾维尔·格鲁维奇想要你 从德里穆斯财团的一群矮人手中夺回他的定制武器，B.L.A.S.T. 3000。
A task description. "you" refers to the player and can be male or female.
Ha! You should have seen the look on Ivian Drimuz’s face when I showed him the B.L.A.S.T. 3000! I thought his head would explode with all the steam building up inside of him.
哈！你该看看我把 B.L.A.S.T. 3000 亮出来时伊维安·德里穆斯的表情！我觉得他内心积攒的愤怒会把他气炸了。
Story message. Speaker: Jewal Gruvich (Dvar, male) "Drimuz Consortium" refers to the collective power of Drimuz, a competitor of Jewal.

Fascinating, I was always under the impression that the DV-R suits kept any emotions from surfacing on the face of a Dvar. If you can spot such a distinction on a stiff mask, your visual scanners must have higher resolutions than we calculated.
太令人着迷了，我一直以为 DV-R 服装会掩盖矮人们的面部表情。能留意到面具上的这种特质，你们的视觉扫描器的分辨率一定比我们计算的还要高。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "DV-R" is a Dvar in-game unit.

Oh, you can tell the difference when you know a Dvar as long and well as I know Ivian Drimuz, alright. Still it’s nothing compared to what he’ll look like once I present to him the treasures of the Junkyard King. Oh yes, the Junkyard King: A fearsome beast of flesh and metal that feasts on anything that moves within the scrapyard. The Spacers worship the colossal creature as their god, bringing him constant sacrifices.
啊呀，当你认识一个矮人足够好足够久，就像我认识伊维安·德里穆斯那样，你就能够明白这种差异了，好吧。但这都比不上我把垃圾王的宝藏展示给他看时他的表现。啊，是的，垃圾王，一种半机械的可怕生物，他会吃掉一切在垃圾场游荡的事物。太空掠夺者把这种巨大生物当作他们的神，还会为他带来祭品。
Story message. Speaker: Jewal Gruvich (Dvar, male) "Junkyard King" is an Assembly Wrecker unit.

There they lie, piled up in the King’s lair, a hoard to be plundered by the bold! But unlike the Drimuz, the Gruvichs are no petty thieves. If we enter, it will be with a big bang![br/][br/]Take the B.L.A.S.T. 3000. It may seem like an ordinary weapon, but it was built to bring the beast down. And it will do its job!
他们在那儿，在国王的藏身处，一个被勇敢者洗劫的地方。不过不像德里穆斯，格鲁维奇可不是卑鄙的小偷。我们进去后，那里将会有个大爆炸！[br/][br/]带上 B.L.A.S.T. 3000。它看上去像是一种普通的武器，但它就是为了干掉那头野兽而造的。这个武器会发挥它的最大作用的！
Story message. Speaker: Jewal Gruvich (Dvar, male) "King" refers to the Junkyard King.
Seek out the Junkyard King in his lair and kill him. [br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: using the B.L.A.S.T. 3000 item can greatly facilitate this mission.)[/recommendedcol]
在垃圾王的藏身处找到垃圾王并将他杀掉。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：使用 B.L.A.S.T. 3000 将十分有效地帮助你完成此任务。）[/recommendedcol]
A task description. () describes third person narration.

Hoho! How daring! A deed truly worthy of any Dvar! Now the path to the hoard of the Junkyard King is clear.[br/][br/]But what is this? The piles are empty, the scrap vaults already cleared out! And in the center of the lair an insignia with the emblem of an amethyst hawk... arrrrrgh! Be cursed, Ivian Drimuz!!!
吼吼！多么勇敢！这才是真正值得矮人去做的事！现在去往垃圾王藏身处的道路通畅了。[br/][br/]但这是什么？垃圾堆是空的，垃圾库已经被清理了！在藏身处的中央是一个带有紫色老鹰的徽章...啊！该死的，伊维安·德里穆斯！！！
Story message. Speaker: Jewal Gruvich (Dvar, male) "insignia with the emblem of an amethyst hawk" refers to the sigil of Ivian Drimuz.

Well met, {STR_LeaderName}. You look like you know your way through the trash labyrinths of Gardip XX. Then you must have come across Jewal Gruvich, a loud, ill-bred individual who likes to boast about the accomplishments of his Consortium, as if the Gruvichs weren’t already a pest without him, drill-blasting their tunnels underneath our mining operations. Just this morning, one of their explosives caused another tremor in one of our settlements.
幸会，{STR_LeaderName}。看起来伽迪普二十号星的垃圾迷宫丝毫没有影响你的样子。那你一定遇见过贾维尔·格鲁维奇吧，一个吵闹没有教养的人，他老是爱吹嘘他们财团的成就。仿佛格鲁维奇没有他就不是一帮害虫了一样。他们还在我们的矿场活动地下面挖隧道。就在今天早上，他们制造的爆炸又让我们的一个定居点剧烈震荡。
Story message. Speaker: Ivian Drimuz (Dvar, male) (Male Dvar) "Consortium" refers to a Dvar organization.

But soon we won’t be bothered by the Gruvichs no more. I have devised a portable cloaking apparatus that we can later scale up to hide our colonies from unwanted eyes. Unfortunately, my cousin Vladismar decided to give the device an unscheduled test. He stole the Instability Projector, thinking it would help him break into professional crime.
不过，过不了多久我们就不用再忍受格鲁维奇了。我发明了一款便携伪装设备，过一会儿我们就能放大这个设备效果，隐藏我们的殖民地，不让那些我们讨厌的人看见。很遗憾，我的表亲弗拉迪斯玛尔想给这个设备来一次突击测试。他偷了变幻投映器，以为可以帮助他进入职业犯罪。
Story message. Speaker: Ivian Drimuz (Dvar, male) "Vladismar" refers to Ivian's cousin and is male. "Instability Projector" refers to an in-game hero item.

Will you help me track down my notorious cousin? Though he himself may be camouflaged, you can still follow the traces of the void-particles that the Instability Projector emits. Vladismar won’t have gotten far yet - the delicate device needs to be transported with caution, and he will have to move slowly lest he wants to risk breaking it.
你可以帮我抓住我那臭名昭著的表亲么？虽然他可能会伪装自己，你还是可以根据变幻投映器发出的虚空粒子找到他。弗拉迪斯玛尔应该还没走远，那个精密仪器需要小心运输。他会走得很慢从而防止变幻投映器受损。
Story message. Speaker: Ivian Drimuz (Dvar, male) "Consortium" refers to a Dvar organization.

Ivian Drimuz wants you to find the thief that took his invisibility device and return the apparatus to him. He will scan for residual traces of the device and send you updates about the last known whereabouts of the thief.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: using a unit with Detection, such as one with the Ocular Implants mod, can greatly facilitate this mission.)[/recommendedcol]
伊维安·德里穆斯想要你找到那个偷窃他隐身设备的窃贼并把设备归还给他。他将扫描设备残留的踪迹，向你提供窃贼最后去处的位置信息。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：使用具有“侦察”的单位，如带有“视觉植入物”模组的单位，将十分有效地帮助你完成此任务。）[/recommendedcol]
A task description. () describes third person narration. "Detection" is a unit ability. "Ocular Implants" is the name of a unit mod.

Excellent! That should teach my good-for-nothing cousin. But his escapade did give me an idea. In the heart of Gardip XX’s garbage jungle, where the sunlight doesn’t touch the lower layers of the scrap piles, lives a creature so terrifying that the Spacers started bringing it sacrifices to avoid its wrath. The lair of this ‘Junkyard King’ is said to hold the planet’s greatest riches. Riches which are ours for the taking.
太棒了！这算是对我那废物表亲的教训吧。不过他的这次出逃倒给了我一个主意。在伽迪普二十号星垃圾丛林的中心，阳光无法触及的垃圾堆底层，住着一种可怕生物，就连太空掠夺者会给它带去祭品以免它暴怒。据说“垃圾王”的藏身处贮藏着这座星球上最富有的财富。这些财富都是我们的。
Story message. Speaker: Ivian Drimuz (Dvar, male)

Using the Instability Projector it should be an easy enough task for you to get past the Junkyard King and dig out its treasury. You’re asking me, why I won’t come along? Well, obviously, someone capable needs to monitor the particle output of the Projector. Wouldn’t want you to suddenly stand there all visible in front of the beast, would we? So what do you say, do we have an agreement?
使用变幻投映器可以让你很轻松地绕过垃圾王，然后挖出它的宝藏。你肯定想问，为什么我不跟着来？嗯，很明显，得有个能干的人来监视投映器的粒子输出量。可不能让你突然在那个野兽面前现形，对吧？所以你怎么说，我们达成一致了么？
Story message. Speaker: Ivian Drimuz (Dvar, male)
Infiltrate the Lair of the 'Junkyard King'

Seek out and enter the lair of the Junkyard King, preferably without being noticed.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: using the Portable Instability Projector item can greatly facilitate this mission.)[/recommendedcol]
找到并进入垃圾王的藏身处，最好不要被发现。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：使用便携式不稳定投射器将十分有效地帮助你完成此任务。）[/recommendedcol]
A task description. () describes third person narration.
Enter the Lair of the 'Junkyard King'
Stealthily descend into the treasure trove of the Junkyard King.
悄悄潜入垃圾王的宝藏珍藏处。

We have reached the specified location, but there are no items of particular interest to be found. Upon scanning the vicinity, we found noteworthy readings of residual PyrX weapon signatures and a decently-sized tunnel which looks like it was created by a series of controlled explosions.
我们已经抵达指定位置，但这里没有什么特别值得注意的东西。扫描附近后，我们发现了残余派尔克斯武器信号的读数以及一个很大的隧道，这个隧道看起来像是连环受控爆炸造成的。
Story message. Speaker: "Ellen Shaw" (Assembly, can be both male or female) "PyrX" is a Promethean brand of weaponry used by Jewal Gruvich.
Controlled explosions you say? No, this cannot be! How can anyone bomb himself through to a vault without shaking and waking its guardian? Damn you, Jewal, and damn the entire Gruvich Consortium!
你说是受控爆炸？不，不可能！怎么可能会有人在不惊动垃圾王的情况下用爆炸进入宝库？该死的贾维尔，还有整个该死的格鲁维奇财团！
Story message. Speaker: Ivian Drimuz (Dvar, male)
Gather any materials and parts of interest of value from the destroyed Spacer Base.
从毁掉的太空掠夺者基地中收集有价值的材料和部件。
Access the main database of the Spaceport to check for the location of the Atirah.
进入宇航中心的主要数据库，查看亚蒂拉的位置。
Salvage the Neural Plexus from the Admin Room.
Use a Synthesis Network Link Unit to establish a data link with Eva Montinga's personal computer.
使用合成网络连接单位与夏娃·蒙汀加的个人电脑建立连接。
Order one of your Synthesis Hacker Units to use the data link to steal encrypted files from Eva Montinga.[br/][br/][firecol](Requires interlink to be set up first!)[/firecol]
命令一个合成骇客单位从夏娃·蒙汀加那里窃取加密文件。[br/][br/][firecol]（需要先设置连接！）[/firecol]
A name of a hero equippment item.
Particularly effective against the Junkyard King.[br/][br/]This shotgun can't receive Ammunition mods.
对垃圾王极其有效。[br/][br/]这把散弹枪无法安装弹药模块。
A description of a hero equippment item. "Junkyard King" is the name of a unique, named Assembly Wrecker unit on the map.
Victory Condition: Recover the Neural Plexus
A header name of a task. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device.
A name of a task. "Neural Plexus" is the name of a unique device.

The Neural Plexus required to directly link the Assembly to CORE was on board of a ship sent to Gardip XX for deconstruction. Your mission is to salvage it from the wreck of the Atirah.[br/][br/]Neural Plexus Retrieved: {INT_0}/{INT_1}

Sent to stop the Assembly; past rivalry
被派去阻止半机械人；曾经的敌人
揭露了针对奇尔寇的罪行

Mission Introduction - Part 1: In my human years, I was fascinated by robots. Until I was touched by CORE and its perfection added to my own. Next to it I was small, insignificant, and my attempts as a scientist to eradicate my human flaws failed. After the Cataclysm, I was given new life. From battered flesh and twisted steel, the Assembly rose and I was resurrected as one of our First. Destruction leads to life. Reassembly to evolution. Chaos brings order and death immortality.
Spoken by Ellen Shaw; added for context

Mission Introduction - Part 2: Ever since our creation, we have been longing for CORE, which had been lost to us after the Cataclysm. CORE is the voice of perfection, and connecting to it entails forming part of ultimate order. Now that the Void Storms have subsided, we have pledged it our allegiance. Together we will reconstruct the Star Union in the shape of the Assembly: A society unbothered by ethical conflict, ignorance, disease, war or death.
Spoken by Ellen Shaw; added for context

Mission Introduction - Part 3: Following CORE’s instructions, we are on our way to recover a Neural Plexus located on Gardip XX. In the Star Union such a device allowed the Emperor to act as a mind-bridge between CORE and the Paragon, connecting him to millions of individuals at once. It was required on all Starholder vessels. One such ship, the ‘Atirah’, was sent to Gardip XX for deconstruction only few days before the Cataclysm. Salvaging it will be an appropriate task for our Scavengers.
Spoken by Ellen Shaw; added for context

Mission Introduction - Part 4: When we entered the system, we found the Void Stabilizers at the Spatial Rift still intact. The probability of their destruction during the Cataclysm was 99.98%, so somebody must have recently repaired them. 10G3N-8 will be pleased. His deconstruction chambers have been empty since the Reassembly of Nerion Gamma.
Spoken by Ellen Shaw; added for context

Mission Outro: Though the betrayal of L0G3N was unexpected, it will only be a temporary setback. The fusion of man and machine will prove to be superior and an end to conflict. While our augmented brains may already surpass purely biological entities on many fronts, the organic brain still holds untapped potential. On Gardip XX, we have witnessed the use of Psionics in different forms. The Celestian Path will help us further our quest for universal assimilation.
Spoken by Ellen Shaw; added for context
